contentfulProduct.seoDescription: We used our proprietary fabric technology, SuperSoft, to create the softest fleece ever. Ultimate comfort. Super soft fleece shorts for your everyday. Front pockets, drawstring waistband, and stretch fabric for just the right fit and feel.
contentfulProduct.title: SuperSoft Fleece Shorts

content.value: Buy any 3 cashmere, silk, linen, supersoft, activewear, socks, jackets, alpaca sweater or ponte pant items save $5, buy any 4 and save $10

We used our proprietary fabric technology, SuperSoft, to create the softest fleece ever. Ultimate comfort. Super soft fleece shorts for your everyday. Front pockets, drawstring waistband, and stretch fabric for just the right fit and feel.
Uses our proprietary SuperSoft fabric to create the softest, most comfortable fleece in the market
Yarn is certified by GRS (Global Recycled Standard) to ensure we are helping to reduce waste and impact on the environment
Eco-friendly dyes resulting in less water consumption
Produced in BSCI (Business Social Compliance Initiative) certified factories which aims to improve working conditions throughout the supply chain
Material: Black - 69% TENCEL™ Modal/18% Recycled Polyester/10% Rayon/3% Spandex; Heather grey - 69% Modal/18% Polyester/10% Rayon/3% Spandex
Model is 5'8" and wearing a size Small
Machine wash cold. Gentle cycle with like colors. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low. Low iron if necessary. Do not dry clean.

productDetails.productDetails:
• Uses our proprietary SuperSoft fabric to create the softest, most comfortable fleece in the market
  • Yarn is certified by GRS (Global Recycled Standard) to ensure we are helping to reduce waste and impact on the environment
  • Eco-friendly dyes resulting in less water consumption
  • Produced in BSCI (Business Social Compliance Initiative) certified factories which aims to improve working conditions throughout the supply chain
  • Inseam: 3"
  • Material: Black - 69% TENCEL™ Modal/18% Recycled Polyester/10% Rayon/3% Spandex; Heather grey - 69% Modal/18% Polyester/10% Rayon/3% Spandex
  • Origin: Ningbo, China
  • Model is 5'8" and wearing a size Small

content.value: Coffee run turned photoshoot by @nikkibohannon because I’m too excited about my new @onequince jumpsuit 🥳

productDescription.productDescription: We used our proprietary fabric technology, SuperSoft, to create the softest fleece ever. This fleece crew is buttery soft with just the right amount of stretch. Perfect for every day with the perfect relaxed fit.

We used our proprietary fabric technology, SuperSoft, to create the softest fleece ever. Next-level comfort from the super soft fleece. These women's wide leg pants have stretch and feature front and back pockets for extra versatility.

content.value: The softest loungewear set ever!! @onequince may possibly be my new favorite brand. They are all about sustainability, affordability, and making great every day items. Definitely a worth it brand 🖤

content.value: A couple of weeks ago I posted in my stories asking for recommendations for a good pair of joggers and you all came through. There were tons of helpful recommendations, but in the end I didn't end up choosing any of them (sorry!)

productDescription.productDescription: We used our proprietary fabric technology, SuperSoft, to create the softest fleece ever. These super soft sweats are extra comfy and perfect for WFH or just lounging around. Front pockets, drawstring waistband, and stretch fabric for just the right fit and feel. Beyond cozy.

content.value: We’re on day 2 of transitioning the 2-year-old to a toddler bed. Everyone’s a little tired and cranky over here, so give me allllll the tea today, please! 😴☕️

content.value: 2021: I have deemed this year as the second year of sweatsuits.

content.value: We partner with factories who have a commitment to responsible production. This means paying workers fairly and doing their best to produce in a way that reduces damage to the environment.

We're working hard to use sustainably produced materials that minimize our impact on the planet, such as organic cotton, responsibly sourced wool, and finishes that are free of harmful chemicals and toxins.
We believe in creating high quality, functional, and timeless essentials that will be used or worn for a long time, and won't end up in a landfill.

content.value: "Quince’s new rug collection is hand knotted and tufted by artisans in India. Best of all, the prices are fairly reasonable for the top-notch quality you’re getting."
"We've got you covered with this very affordable cashmere sweater that somehow clocks in at a miraculous 50 buckeroos."
"New Online Fashion Brand Aims To Get Eco-Friendly Clothes From Factory-To-Closet At Affordable Prices."
"While D2C brands have changed the way we shop,
is looking to change retail even more dramatically."
"A cashmere crewneck for $50?! It’s now a reality — in 10 colors — thanks to Quince."
"The brand connects with factories to sell direct to the customer, promising consumers better prices and factories with better margins."
"The Quince Organic Percale Luxe Sheet Set collection is an excellent choice for anyone who sleeps hot at night."
"You can get a cashmere sweater for only $50 from this radically transparent basics company."
"My next plane outfit when I can travel again."
"These Luxurious Linen Sheets Make Me Feel Like I’m Sleeping in a Fancy Hotel"
